body:
When I spawn in the hub now, no matter what hub it may be, I always spawn with this 'Teleport Device', but nothing else, and I still see people with the Lobby and Game Menus - can anyone explain why this is happening? Because it is really annoying - and when I vote I dont get my package, either. 

Thanks,

iBiZa
